GSD.description:
scsi: qla2xxx: Fix premature hw access after PCI error

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 5ef6319f9882699613d5182fbd7929b017e8c5ab. For more details please see the references link.
